name: GET OUT OF CONTROL (SlineHunter)
description:
A simple game about passing from point to point, but in the process, something can get out of control. For example — control.

Installation:

  1. Unpack
  2. Run .exe file in folder 

Control:

  • WASD — movement
  • M — mute
  • Space — restart level
  • Alt — skip level
